澰字的基本解释

澰
liàn
浸渍。
〔澰滟〕同“瀲滟”，水漫溢的样子。
水清。

澰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liàn］
［《集韻》盧感切，上感，來。］
浸渍。

澰字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　澰； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页653第25
【廣韻】【集韻】?力冉切，音斂。與瀲同。瀲灩，水溢貌。　又【玉篇】【集韻】?力驗切，斂去聲。【博雅】淸也。　又【集韻】盧感切，音壈。義同。又漬也。

澰字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
澰字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
trough
liàn
Dipping.
〔潋滟] Same as "潋滟", it looks like water is overflowing.
The water is clear.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liàn］
["Ji Yun" Lu feels cut and feels, come on. ]
Dipping.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Siji 1】【Shuizi Department】　潋; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 653 25
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Li Ran cut, the sound converged. Same as 潋. Luminous, water overflowing appearance.　[Yu Pian] [Ji Yun]? Try to cut, restrain the sound. [Bo Ya] Cheong Ye.　 [Ji Yun] Lu Ganqi, sound. The same meaning. It's also stained.
